project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: System should support at least 10,000 concurrent users
Message delivery latency must be under 1 second

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one or group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio streams connect within 3 seconds
Video quality adjusts dynamically based on network conditions
dependencies: WebRTC or similar video streaming service
non_functional: Support HD video quality with fallback to lower resolutions
End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: No actionable feedback provided ('vhgfuy'), so the requirements remain unchanged from the previous version.
